title: [Stonecutters' Lodge, Exterior]
description: The tunnel opens out into a large, open, hemispherical space.  Extending from the wall is a building facade with the words "Mraent Granite Quarry" carved above a rounded archway.  A heavy iron door, smashed by some tremendous blow, hangs precariously from its hinges, no longer securing the hallway that leads deep into the darkness beyond.
